head.title: Spanish Customers Focus of New Venture

hedline.hl1: Spanish Customers Focus of New Venture

abstract.p: Rapp Collins Worldwide forms joint venture with HispanAmerica Response Marketing focusing on work for marketers seeking to instill loyalty among Spanish-speaking customers (S)

block.p: Rapp Collins Worldwide in New York, a unit of the Omnicom Group devoted to direct marketing, has formed a joint venture with HispanAmerica Response Marketing in Newfoundland, Pa., a unit of Direct Merchants, focused on work for marketers seeking to instill loyalty among their Spanish-speaking customers. Terms were not disclosed.

Rapp Collins Worldwide in New York, a unit of the Omnicom Group devoted to direct marketing, has formed a joint venture with HispanAmerica Response Marketing in Newfoundland, Pa., a unit of Direct Merchants, focused on work for marketers seeking to instill loyalty among their Spanish-speaking customers. Terms were not disclosed.

Beatriz Mallory, 41, who had been president at HispanAmerica Response Marketing, will relocate to New York and become chief executive of an agency named HispanAmerica, which will develop online and offline advertising for marketers like the Cendant Corporation and SBC Communications.
